query:
WITH
                    rec AS (
                        INSERT INTO recurrences (
                            frequency,
                            is_every,
                            current_task_id
                        )
                        VALUES (
                            $1,
                            $2,
                            $3
                        )
                        RETURNING
                            id
                    )
                UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    recurrence_id = r.id
                FROM
                    rec r
                WHERE
                    t.id = $3
